abstract: Glenn Kenny reviews movie Marauders, directed by Steven C Miller and starring Bruce Willis.

headline.main: Review: Bruce Willis Is a Banker With Issues in ‘Marauders’

snippet: In this film, robberies vex Mr. Willis’s character and an F.B.I. agent played by Christopher Meloni....
lead_paragraph: In this film, robberies vex Mr. Willis’s character and an F.B.I. agent played by Christopher Meloni.
